00013 #else
00014         #include <GL/gl.h>
00015         #include <GL/glu.h>
00016 #endif
00017 
00018 #include "SDL.h"
00019 #include "SDL_image.h"
00020 
00021 #include "Shape.h"
00022 
00023 #include <math.h>
00024 #include <string>
00025 #include <list>
00026 
00027 namespace TenUI {
00028                 
00029         class Rectangle : public Shape {        
00030         protected:              
00031         public:
00032                 // constructor
00033                 Rectangle(DisplayObject *p, int x=0, int y=0, int w=0, int h=0, float r=0.0, float g=0.0, float b=0.0, float sr=0.0, float sg=0.0, float sb=0.0, float strSize=0.0, double rot=0.0, double s=1.0, double o=1.0)
00034                         :Shape(p,x,y,r,g,b,sr,sg,sb,strSize,rot,s,o){                   
00035                         this->setW(w);
00036                         this->setH(h);
00037                 }       
00038                 virtual ~Rectangle(){}
00039                         
00040                 // game loop (and init) function
00041                 virtual void init(){}
00042                 virtual void update(){} 
00043                 virtual void draw(){
00044                         // rectangle's stroke
00045                                 glColor4f(strokeColor[0], strokeColor[1], strokeColor[2],(GLfloat)opacity*strokeColor[3]);
00046                                 
00047                         // draw line
00048                                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);                                                              
00049                                         glVertex2f((left-strokeSize),(bottom-strokeSize));
00050                                         glVertex2f((left-strokeSize),(bottom+h+strokeSize));
00051                                         glVertex2f((left+w+strokeSize),(bottom+h+strokeSize));
00052                                         glVertex2f((left+w+strokeSize),(bottom-strokeSize));
00053                                 glEnd();
00054                         
00055                         // rectangle's color
00056                                 glColor4d(color[0], color[1], color[2],(GLfloat)this->opacity);
00057                                 
00058                         // draw rectangle
00059                                 glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00060                                         glVertex2i((int)left,(int)bottom);
00061                                         glVertex2i((int)left,(int)(bottom+h));
00062                                         glVertex2i((int)(left+w),(int)(bottom+h));
00063                                         glVertex2i((int)(left+w),(int)(bottom));
00064                                 glEnd();
00065                 }
00066 
00067         };
00068 
00069 }
00070 #endif /*RECTANGLE_H_*/
